posts.title: Biden Announces $2 Trillion Climate Plan
posts.author: Katie Glueck and Lisa Friedman
posts.body: Mr. Bidenâ€™s plan links tackling climate change with economic recovery from the coronavirus and addressing racism, drawing praise from onetime critics.
posts.pictureDescription: Former Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. is expected to unveil a plan for reducing fossil fuel use across the U.S. economy.CreditCredit...Michelle V. Agins/The New York Times
